title: Irelia's Login
body:
I absolutely love Irelia's Login, specifically the music, and thus, I desperately need to know the artist and the exact title of the song, can you guys help me out with that? {{item:3070}}
 
(Even support told me to ask around on boards just to hope any rioter reads this lmao)

replies.body: Hey there, I composed the Irelia login and I'm glad to hear you enjoy it! The title on the printed score is "Irelia Login" but we'll call it "Irelia, the Blade Dancer" when we release the audio on Soundcloud. With instrumental champion themes we tend to be pretty straightforward when it comes to titles.

> [{quoted}](name=Scherzo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=2vqp0mX5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-31T03:33:50.046+0000)
>
> Hey there, I composed the Irelia login and I'm glad to hear you enjoy it! The title on the printed score is "Irelia Login" but we'll call it "Irelia, the Blade Dancer" when we release the audio on Soundcloud. With instrumental champion themes we tend to be pretty straightforward when it comes to titles.

Hey Scherzo, I'm a music student about to enter first year of music university. I will be in french horn performance program. I really enjoyed the Irelia theme this time.  I cant quite place my finger on it, but i get a classical trained orchestration vibe from this. It felt like there was a attempt to balance western style and asian melodies. Am i correct in my assumption? The fluttering flutes, pentatonic(i think its pentatonic) lines, and the percussion are very asian, but the sustain from everything else(the constant heavy brass and bass sustain), and the explosive climaxes(Huge french horns) scream western Hollywood. I also might think it is because of the western trained orchestra members. (I MIGHT BE TOTALLY WRONG, BUT I CANT SHAKE THE FEELING OFF.) is there any insight that you could give?

also, I am a huge fan of the fact that you put out the scores you composed online. Scores cost a fortune, and a bunch of them are not available at all(IM LOOK AT YOU FINAL FANTASY) so i really appreciate the ones you've posted. is there a possibility this one will be out too? I would love a PDF so i can analyze and study it(and perhaps have a chance to play it with orchestra friends).
i was also looking for the composer! I played cello for like 8 years I just cant get over the melody. and yes youre right, the pentatonic lines are well used in here, which made it sound very Asian.
Excuse me sir, may i ask you if you can give us the music sheet ? I think a lot of us would be glad to play it with an orchester.
